results.title: Create an ASP.NET Core app with React - Visual Studio (Windows)
results.description: Create an ASP.NET Core project to serve as an API backend and a React project to provide the user interface in Visual Studio.

descriptions.content: Create an ASP.NET Core project to serve as an API backend and a React project to provide the user interface in Visual Studio.

results.title: Tutorial: Prepare a React single-page application for authentication - Microsoft identity platform
results.description: Learn how to prepare a React single-page app (SPA) for authentication using the Microsoft identity platform.

descriptions.content: Learn how to prepare a React single-page app (SPA) for authentication using the Microsoft identity platform.

results.title: Get started with MSAL React - Microsoft Authentication Library for JavaScript
results.description: Get started with MSAL React. Learn how to initialize MSAL React, determine whether a user is authenticated, protect components, sign a user in and acquire an access token.

descriptions.content: Learn how to initialize MSAL React, determine whether a user is authenticated, protect components, sign a user in and acquire an access token.
